questions.question_text: Which of the following risk assessment findings for an online-only business should be given the HIGHEST priority to address availability concerns?

choices.B: The web server for the online store was found to be vulnerable to distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
choices.A: The back office system that processes payments to providers has slowed.
choices.D: The access point for the visitor WiFi network has several unpatched vulnerabilities.
choices.C: Email authentication through a connector to a single sign-on (SSO) service has a history of failure.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. The web server for the online store was found to be vulnerable to distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
